message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you, and this offer represents a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that price.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,800 is below my bottom line.  How about we settle at $11,200? That's a fair compromise, and reflects the true value of this product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with $11,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about we settle at $11,000? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
